title: Game crashes after champ select
body: My game crashed right after I champion selection and I could not get back on. It just says game crashed and I kept retrying and restarted my pc but it still wont work. I now have to wait 20 mins before playing each game. I also tried to play on my smurf account and the same thing happened and i have to wait 5 mins to play each game now. pls help, thank you

replies.body:
Crash errors after champ select that *don't* mention network disconnection are often the result of driver or hardware issues local to your PC. We've consolidated some common solutions in our [Bugsplat & Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I suggest giving those steps a try.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
